title: I never received the 34 point poro icon
body: I had more than 34 points for awhile and a few of my friends already have it.

replies.body:
If you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll be able to resolve this with you.

Let me know if you have any issues submitting that ticket.
